col2: Powerful no-code automation is built into every Electronics Inventory board.
Give your team a blueprint for success with tried-and-true templates from the Electronics Inventory community.
Enforce security controls on mobile app usage through built-in mobile device management (MDM) support for iOS and Android.

Integrate with more than 200+ apps and tools your team depends on like Slack, Google Drive, Salesforce, and more directly into your Electronics Inventory boards. (Note: Some Power-Ups by our partners require an additional subscription fee.)
Create as many Electronics Inventory boards as your team sees fit; from onboarding new hires, to sprint planning, and every team meeting agenda in between.
Break down projects into byte-sized tasks and get granular by assigning members and due dates to individual tasks.
Bring process and formality to your workflow by structuring information on Electronics Inventory cards to the task at hand with Custom Fields.
Electronic Inventory’s reporting tool lets you access real-time insights and communicate your team’s progress in a visual and meaningful way.
Plan your project, stay on top of every sprint, and see how all of the moving parts fit together over time with Timeline.
Bring a clearer perspective to all the work happening across a single board in a list format where you can create and edit cards in just a few clicks.
Calendar displays start dates, due dates, and advanced checklist items so you can see what lies ahead for your project and stay on top of today’s to-dos.
Plan an offsite, scout new office locations, or manage product distribution points by adding locations to your cards and visualizing them geographically on a map.
See your projects and tasks across Workspaces and boards in a spreadsheet-style list that can be sorted and filtered to drill down to exactly the cards you need to see.
Workspace calendar displays items with start dates and due dates across your projects and boards, so you can see what lies ahead for all your teamwork.
